record.id: field.name="db.template" and file.name="pmenv" and term=NULL and format.name="pm.profile.g" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: db.template
record.file.name: pmenv
record.format.name: pm.profile.g

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), enables members of this profile to perform a Template Mass Update of incidents. In a Template Mass Update, a template displays a list of fields that can be updated. The user enters a value for each field to be updated to complete the process.

If not selected (set to false), enables members of this profile to perform a Simple Mass Update of incidents. In a Simple Mass Update, Service Manager displays a record form in which the user can enter values for selected fields. These values are then applied to all of the records selected for the Simple Mass Update.
